description: Generate and manage Spotify playlists with AI. Search songs, edit lists, and refine music to fit any vibe or request.

configSchema.title: MCP Session Configuration
configSchema.description: No client configuration required. Authenticate via OAuth when prompted.

capabilities.name: generate_playlist
capabilities.description: Create a playlist and return a playlistable URL immediately (async generation).

capabilities.name: get_playlist
capabilities.description: Get a playlist details by ID.

capabilities.name: playlist_suggestions
capabilities.description: Get 6 AI-generated playlist mood suggestions for the current user.

capabilities.name: edit_playlist
capabilities.description: Add or remove songs in a playlist by Spotify track IDs.

capabilities.name: search_songs
capabilities.description: Search Spotify tracks by query. Returns id, name, artist, image, url.

capabilities.name: search_artists
capabilities.description: Search Spotify artists by query. Returns id, name, image, url, genres.
